content: this adorable christmas crochet dog scarf will make your furry friend look festive and extremely cute this crochet candy cane dog scarf is made in red and white diagonal stripes and has asymmetrical ends you can easily make this scarf longer or shorter by increasing or decreasing number of repeat row the scarf has also two buttons and is embellished with a tassel free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-dog-scarf-christmas/ by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format
